footer.description: Training & Simulator platform for modern crane operation and logistics safety.

about.title: About LSSCTC
about.heroDescription: Leading Safety Skills Crane Training Center - Your trusted partner in professional crane operator education and safety training.
about.missionDescription: To provide world-class crane operator training that prioritizes safety, competency, and professional excellence. We are committed to developing skilled operators who contribute to safer worksites and more efficient operations.
about.visionDescription: To be the premier crane training institution, recognized for our commitment to safety excellence and innovative training methodologies that set industry standards.
about.storySubtitle: Over two decades of excellence in crane operator training and safety education
about.yearsExperienceDesc: Established in 2003, we've been at the forefront of crane operator education, adapting to industry changes and technological advances.
about.trainedOperatorsDesc: Over 5,000 certified crane operators have graduated from our programs, now working safely across various industries.
about.successRateDesc: Our comprehensive training approach results in a 98% pass rate for certification exams and excellent job placement rates.
about.modernCraneFleetDesc: Latest model cranes including mobile, tower, and overhead cranes for comprehensive hands-on training.
about.advancedSimulatorsDesc: High-fidelity crane simulators providing safe learning environments for complex scenarios.
about.dedicatedTrainingYardsDesc: Purpose-built training areas simulating real-world construction and industrial environments.
about.classroomTechnologyDesc: Interactive learning spaces equipped with modern audiovisual technology and safety demonstration areas.
about.safetySubtitle: We maintain the highest safety standards and hold all necessary certifications to ensure quality training
about.ncccoCertifiedDesc: National Commission for the Certification of Crane Operators accredited training provider
about.oshaCompliantDesc: All training programs meet or exceed OSHA safety requirements and standards
about.isoCertifiedDesc: Quality management system certification ensuring consistent training excellence
about.industryPartnershipsDesc: Partnerships with leading construction and industrial companies for real-world training
about.leadershipSubtitle: Experienced professionals leading our commitment to excellence
about.trainingDirectorDesc: 25+ years in crane operations and safety training with extensive industry certifications.
about.safetyManagerDesc: Certified safety professional with expertise in OSHA regulations and risk management.
about.operationsManagerDesc: Former construction supervisor with deep understanding of real-world crane operations.

simulator.title: 3D Simulation Platform
simulator.subtitle: Download and install the native 3D crane simulation client to practice operational scenarios with realistic physics and assessment tracking.

backup.title: Google Drive Mirror
backup.description: If the main download is not working, you can use this backup link.

installation.title: Installation Guide
installation.step1: Click Download Simulator to obtain the installer (.exe).
installation.step2: Verify the file signature if your policy requires (right-click  Properties  Digital Signatures).
installation.step3: Run the installer & follow on-screen steps. Accept required dependencies (Visual C++ runtime, DirectX) if prompted.
installation.step4: Launch the application. On first start you will be asked for your platform credentials (same as web login).
installation.step5: Allow outbound network access for real-time telemetry (port 443).

usage.title: Usage Overview
usage.intro: After signing in, choose a Scenario from the left panel. Each scenario describes required objectives and safety thresholds.
usage.controlsMapping: Controls Mapping: Open Settings Controls to review joystick / keyboard layout.
usage.telemetryPanel: Telemetry Panel: Real-time load, boom angle, wind speed, and safety margin indicators.
usage.assessmentMode: Assessment Mode: When enabled, your actions are recorded for instructor review.
usage.replay: Replay: Use the replay timeline to analyze performance and near-miss events.
usage.advanced: Need advanced configuration (offline caching, graphics tuning)? Refer to the upcoming Technical Addendum or contact support.

support.withDetails: with your OS version and log file

error.downloadUrlNotConfigured: Download URL not configured. Please contact support.

banner.description: Endtoend academy for crane & logistics simulation: structured courses, realistic scenarios, safety benchmarks and performance analyticsbuilt for Learners, Instructors and Simulator Managers.

aboutCenter.title: About the Training Center
aboutCenter.description: Our integrated learning & simulation environment accelerates operational excellence while enforcing safety baselines. Every learner journey is mapped to measurable performance indicators and scenario complexity tiers.

points.scenario: Scenario-driven simulation aligned with real port metrics
points.analytics: Role-based analytics for continuous skill progression
points.modular: Modular course design with safety-first methodology
points.dashboard: Unified dashboard: sessions, performance, risk signals
points.api: API-ready architecture for future IoT & telemetry feeds
